Text:
Thanks, I'll throw up the instructions since there aren't any.

Download and Install the Program.

Once Installed (Un-Check the update box)

Open the "Patch Folder"

Find the "install_Vista_Win7_Win8" Batch File

Right Click-Run as Administrator

Hit any Key to Exit

Double Click on the new Trojan Remover Exe

Add Shortcut to Desktop or Pin To Start.

Enjoy!
AVG picked up Win32 Heur Virus. Its in the batch file.
